Blog.post: haha today at like 5-6-ish ya. i went to my friend chynnas house! ya, and we played outside, we skated and junk like that. then we walked to the store, and ME N EDS! OHHH YAAA! its funny if u kno what im talkin bout, ya. we ate pizza, and the junk food t hat we bought, then we went and got some more friends that i hadnt seen in like forever.hhaa, no, well ya.well ok, it was fun times, we wrestled! lol, my back itched, alrighty. must go.
today was ok, i didnt really wanna go to the water park, kinda tired but it was fun. i guess, didnt do much, stayed in the wave pool most of the time. yaaa thats it. yay! linkin park is on!

what?! i didnt post yesterday, oh well not like n e thing happened. well today was the day the 8th grade class went to magic mountain, whoooo. it was aight, fun. ya, better than bein at school all day. i got dizzy, seriously almost barfed, and uhh got soaking wet from this raft ride,omg i was freezing! funny funny, and tomorrow is the day we go to the water park, whoo, eh. not too excited bout that, but i guess it will b better than school,ya! next week is our last week of school! i graduate on the 2nd! yay! alrighty, bye. --linkinpark--------

today me and my friend went to play tennis against 2 boys. yaa we won. well i dunno we kinda lost track but oh well. we only played for like an hour and we were out there for like 3. soo ya, then i went to target and wal mart! whoo whoo! thats pretty much it, ok. ((linkin park))

hola. uhh lets see, today is saturday, tomorrow is sunday, the next day is monday, when i hav school. and after that is tuesday, when i go to MAGIC MOUNTAIN with the 8th grade, and the next day is wednesday, also the day when the school goes to the water park. whoo, not really. have a nice day. LINKIN PARK!!!

well the dance....not good. boring. bad.sad.dissapointing.lol. they played LINKIN PARK and everyone got off the dance floor, like u cant dance to LP, those losers. i of course danced in my lil area. ya, it wasnt worth that $3. lol. alrighty, i will go now.

uhh today, nothing happened. again. well the district dance is tonight, yay. uhh lets see in history, nothing happened, science was fun, we didnt do much, we read bout freaky lil bug and sea animals. and leeches! uhh lunch was fun, math, uhh oh im partners with garrett, u may kno him as the ONLY person who comments on my posts.lol. alrighty, bye. ooh! havent talked bout linkin park in a while...theyre the bomb.lol. chester is the coolest fo shizzle my nizzle john-dizzle, and so on...

hah, today was interesting. Uhh, nothing happened in PE, oh in band!lol, i got married...to garrett! lol, and then we were gonna get divorced, but he left because it was LUNCH TIME.lol, so now we're still married, and guess what? he didnt even wait for his own wife! jk, but thats funny. uhh, oh at tennis practice and what not today, theres this foreigh exchange high school boy, hes funny! lol. funny funny. ok,. alrighty! haha, tomorrow is the 8th grade district dance. how fun.eh. but what am i going to wear!? *sarcasm*

"Garrett said... cuz u r hot alex. u just dont kno it. lrh . but they freak me out. aaron gets all over u. its funny but bad for u.ha" ya. garrett u kno u were one of them too.lol. ya i kno he kinda freaks me out. haha, but its alright when u say it. lol. _____________________________________________________________ anyways...today was slow. boring. had a band performance.whoo. not. gotta go.

Today was funny, uhh it was minimum day at school today. hey! i'd still b in school right now, interesting...Hmm, so how was ur day, today a bunch of 7th grade boys were telling me i was hot.lol. riiiight, alrighty then thats actually all thats happened so far...i must go now. bye

Nothing really happened today, ay. Uh i went to my nanas house.lol, other places then bak here, home. whoo. I eventually got started on some homework, grand. not. ok thats it for this. Heard LINKIN PARK on the radio about 3 times today, that is what i call a sign of good times to come. hah. Saw this man on TV, his name was Chester, he was old tho. wasnt my chester. hahaha, ok, thats enough.

Oh yeah-izzle...who got outta the house and did something?? i did! well, i got outta the house and went to my friends house! whoo whoo, we played outside, twas grand fun, fine fun indeed. we talked bout...boys! lol, ate pizza, got ice cream from the INFAMOUS ice cream LADY, uh walked to Texaco, then to the grocery store, then to the 89 cent store, whoo whoo, good fun. oh ya, now im home and bored again. *ch-ch-ch-ch-check it out, what-what-what-whats it all about*

Its about 2:30 and all i've dont today was homework, extra credit, dang i need it too. i've been up since 10, and i actually got dressed thinking i might go somewhere, hah. Im bored i may go play outside soon, perhaps i'll even call someone, whoa! watch out! alrighty, good bye.

yeah so today, ur never gonna believe what happened...nothing, but oh well. lets see, its almost gonna b 10:00, at 6:30 we had a "movie nite" at school, and me, having nothing better to do went, it was grand fun.haha, we watched FINDING NEMO, whoo whoo. but before that at school, uhhh nothing happened, well SOMETHING did happen, but i should post it.hah. gotcha! oh ya then i was walking home with some friends and we just ended up coming to my house and playing on the swing, haha. fine fun, fine fun indeed.and now im just here, alrighty, until something happens. good day. Lets see, LINKIN PARK ROCKS! whoo whoo! Oh right! this is my first post, so u wouldnt kno that i like LINKIN PARK, right? well now u do, i like LP, alot. Chester is the koolest ohhhh ya! well today, i only brought up chester like,what, 5 times, outta the whole day. thats good. alrighty, bye bye muchacha/muchacho.haha

whoa whoa! havent posted in quite a while...guess i've been TOO busy, yaaa right. well friday i went to this BIG concert, and i met YELLOWCARD, i hugged ryan and sean...i also met DAVEY HAVOK!!!! OHHHH YEAAA! and uhh today i started summer school...as a freshman...at high school!! agh! yes, very interesting...better food, way better. we listened to the radio in class! and LP came on..ohya

whoa whoa! havent posted in quite a while...guess i've been TOO busy, yaaa right. well friday i went to this BIG concert, and i met YELLOWCARD, i hugged ryan and sean...i also met DAVEY HAVOK!!!! OHHHH YEAAA! and uhh today i started summer school...as a freshman...at high school!! agh! yes, very interesting...better food, way better.
